description: This is an example configuration file. You can use this as a template for creating your own configuration file.

platforms.name: Jeedom
platforms.ip: PUT IP ADDRESS OF YOUR JEEDOM HERE
platforms.port: PUT SERVER PORT OF YOUR JEEDOM HERE
platforms.url: PUT URL COMPLEMENT OF YOUR JEEDOM HERE
platforms.apikey: PUT APIKEY OF YOUR JEEDOM HERE
platforms.pollerperiod: PUT 0 FOR DISABLING POLLING, 1 - 100 INTERVAL IN SECONDS. 2 SECONDS IS THE DEFAULT
